content.question: Which of the following was the most direct effect of conditions such as those described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Internal migration in search of better economic opportunities
Earlier marriages and an increase in family size
A middle-class movement to the suburbs
Conservative opposition to an increased government role in the economy

content.answer: Internal migration in search of better economic opportunities

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
